summary: Rocket pioneer and occultist - JPL founder, Aleister Crowley follower, mysterious death
key_facts: Co-founded Jet Propulsion Laboratory (JPL) at Caltech
Ordo Templi Orientis (OTO) leader - Aleister Crowley's Thelema
Babalon Working ritual with L. Ron Hubbard (1946)
Security clearance revoked due to Communist Party connections
Died June 17, 1952 in home explosion (age 37) - officially accident
Suspicious circumstances: FBI surveillance, espionage suspicions
concealment: FBI files, security clearance revocation details, death investigation
